objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='grad1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1a1a1a;stop-opacity:1'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#303030;stop-opacity:1'/></linearGradient><linearGradient id='grad2' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='0%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#4d4d4d;stop-opacity:0.7'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#1a1a1a;stop-opacity:0.7'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#grad1)'/><rect x='40' y='40' width='1000' height='1000' rx='20' stroke='#5a5a5a' stroke-width='3' fill='none'/><rect x='60' y='60' width='960' height='960' rx='15' stroke='#727272' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M0,200 C250,150 400,300 550,250 C700,200 850,300 1080,250 L1080,0 L0,0 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.5'/><path d='M0,880 C200,930 350,830 550,880 C750,930 900,830 1080,880 L1080,1080 L0,1080 Z' fill='url(#grad2)' opacity='0.5'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='400' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.02'/><circle cx='540' cy='540' r='300' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.03'/><rect x='90' y='90' width='900' height='900' rx='10' fill='#ffffff' opacity='0.05'/></svg>

objects.text:
• Breathable mesh construction
• Advanced cushioning system
• Lightweight flexible design
• Superior stability & support

product_details.name: Adidas Precision Pro: Elite Performance Training Shoes | Ultimate Comfort Meets Style
product_details.description:
• Breathable mesh upper construction for enhanced ventilation
• Signature 3-stripe Adidas branding in crisp white
• Advanced cushioning system with white midsole for superior comfort
• Durable black and grey textured mesh material for lasting performance
• Flexible and lightweight design for agile movements
• Secure lacing system for customized fit
• Non-marking outsole perfect for indoor and outdoor training
• Modern two-tone colorway (Black/White) for versatile styling
• Ergonomic design for natural foot movement
• Impact-absorbing technology for high-intensity workouts
• Sleek athletic silhouette suitable for training and casual wear
• Reinforced heel counter for enhanced stability

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek, modern design ideal for a sports product promotion. At the top, a bold and impactful heading (`heading`) introduces the core message with a strong emphasis. Below it, a concise subheading (`subheading`) highlights the product category. A descriptive list (`description`) outlines key features in bullet points, enhancing user engagement. A product image (`product_image`) is centrally placed, visually drawing attention to the footwear. At the bottom, the price (`price`) is prominently displayed beside a rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with the label (`cta`) urging users to shop. The dark radial gradient background (`background`) and overlapping geometric shapes add depth and sophistication.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black (#1a1a1a)
- Charcoal Gray (#303030)
- Silver Gray (#727272)
- Soft White (#e6e6e6)
- Pure White (#ffffff)
product_color: The product image features a sleek athletic shoe with a modern, monochromatic design dominated by black, charcoal, and white tones. The upper body blends dark gray mesh (Hex #4A4A4A) and black overlays (Hex #1E1E1E), subtly transitioning with a textured gradient for visual depth. The iconic white Adidas stripes (Hex #F5F5F5), heel tip, and contrasting midsole (Hex #E5E5E5) add sharp highlights, drawing focus to brand identity. Black laces and inner lining maintain visual consistency. This bold yet minimal palette makes it ideal for a high-impact advertisement banner using colors like Black (#1E1E1E), White (#F5F5F5), Dark Gray (#4A4A4A), and Mid Gray (#7A7A7A).
